name: SLAPSHOT Rebound
description:
Slapshot is an online multiplayer game where you and 5 other players play a game of hockey. The game is physics-based, so teamwork and crisp passing are essential to win. Play with your friends or team up with other Slapshot players!

Free-to-Play
Slapshot is free-to-play indefinitely. Cosmetic elements are available for purchase and obtainable through gameplay.

Controls
You control your own player's movements with WASD and a mouse. Use the mouse to swing your stick and control the puck. Trackpads work, but a mouse is absolutely recommended.
